description: This St. Patrick's Day, try the Irish Eyes cocktail for a delicious and easy way to celebrate! The recipe is simple to follow, with readily available ingredients at most liquor stores or grocery stores.To make this drink, all you need is green crème de menthe, cream or half-and-half, and Irish whiskey. It's as simple as shaking them together in a cocktail shaker.
name: Irish Eyes
recipeIngredient: ¼ oz. Green crème de menthe liqueur

recipeInstructions.name: In a cocktail shaker, combine all ingredients.
recipeInstructions.text: In a cocktail shaker, combine all ingredients.

recipeInstructions.name: Shake it up until it’s well combined.
recipeInstructions.text: Shake it up until it’s well combined.

recipeInstructions.name: Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
recipeInstructions.text: Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
